topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521dcce63687252f9610000#post_5521dcce63687252f9610000
Using words like success with evolution doesn't really sit right, A.) because there is absolutely no driving force behind the process, and B.) because no matter how well put together anything looks at first glance any close inspection reveals lots and lots and lots of flaws.

Its more like "You are result of over a million years of stuff kinda sorta working out and resulting in slight advantages to breeding over rival strains of your own species, but there are still lots of holdovers from your evolutionary past that result both in aberrant social behavior and numerous medical problems."

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521dee56368720c27e10500#post_5521dee56368720c27e10500
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521de7063687252a1cb1400#post_5521de7063687252a1cb1400
We are both passionate, really the only major difference is i'm right and he is wrong.[/bq]

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521da4963687231669e2900#post_5521da4963687231669e2900
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521d9b063687208643d1a00#post_5521d9b063687208643d1a00
Again for now, there is no evidence that makes it a sure thing that even entropy can't be manipulated or out right controlled, if random physics can make the big bang, a great enough intelligence can make a better one,[/bq]
That was the single dumbest comment on physics I have EVER heard.  Hypothetically if there was a alien race *THAT* smart it would be 100% forbidden to fuck with entropy because even if you were to "slightly" change it you would instantly kill every last organic lifeform in the entire universe by causing it's cells to boil from the inside thus turning all life in the universe into a instant fire.

Or better yet why not change the speed of light?!  Sure you'd create a particle of infinite energy and as a result any matter the light particle interacts with would cause a chain reaction destroying all matter in the known universe.

Or better yet why not change gravity?  Sure you'd instantly collapse all matter in the universe in on itself, but why not?

Or strong nuclear force or weak nuclear force?  It's not like creating a universe wide nuclear reaction would be a big deal?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
